briefdescription.para: The location to save the logs.

simplesect.para: Do not call this function unless you have a good reason. Once the logger is created it will be reused automatically.

detaileddescription.para:
If the default logged has not been initialised it will be initialised automatically and returned.
The default logger.

briefdescription.para: Get the file handle for a log location.

detaileddescription.para:
If the log file cannot be open then stderr is returned.
location
The file location.
Always a valid FILE handle, even in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Get the last event from a logger.

simplesect.para: The last event or NULL if there have been no events.

briefdescription.para: Get the last event from the default logger.

simplesect.para: The last event or NULL if there have been no events.
The event instance that was created.
The event instance that was created.

briefdescription.para: Log an event with the default logger.

detaileddescription.para:
This is really only used for tests, you should use EagleLogger_Get() to get the default logger.
out
The file stream to send the error messages to.
A new logger.

Free the memory associated with the last error event.
logger
The logger.
